summary: Young Augusten Burroughs absorbs experiences that could make for a shocking memoir: the son of an alcoholic father and an unstable mother, he's handed off to his mother's therapist, Dr. Finch, and spends his adolescent years as a member of Finch's bizarre extended family.
cast: Annette Bening|Brian Cox|Joseph Fiennes|Evan Rachel Wood|Alec Baldwin|Joseph Cross|Jill Clayburgh|Gwyneth Paltrow|Gabrielle Union|Patrick Wilson|Kristin Chenoweth|Dagmara Dominczyk|Colleen Camp|Jack Kaeding|Gabriel Guedj|Nancy Cassaro|Omid Abtahi|Julie Remala|Will Carter|Bonnie Weis|Dakotah Masset|Marianne Muellerleile|Anthony Aria|Augusten Burroughs|Lindsay Canton|Leslie Grossman|Janis Jones|Joshua Levine|Margaret Newborn|Devanny Pinn|Gary Sievers|Joseph Sims|Scott Slifer|Cole Volmer|Pilar Walsh|Rachel Zeskind
title: Recortes de mi vida
